Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back The Howey Room The Howey Room 2 The Howey Urban Standard Twin The Howey Room 6845 Melbourne The Howey Melbourne &vert; 3 Nights Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Housed in a beautiful art deco building, this boutique design hotel is located in the heart of Melbourne's laneway precinct, right on Little Collins Street. The Howey Hotel offers well appointed guest rooms, which are contemporary and tastefully decorated. Each room features a work desk, an LCD TV with Foxtel, Free Wi-Fi, minibar and a modern ensuite. View more View less 3 nights from $ 315 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until 14 Nov 25 by 4pm or until sold out Deal includes: 3 nights accommodation Room Types Urban Standard King Room The Howey Hotel offers well appointed guest rooms, which are contemporary and tastefully decorated. Each room features a work desk, an LCD TV with Foxtel, Free Wi-Fi, minibar and a modern ensuite. 3 nights from $429 per person share twin. Flights are additional For Fri or Sat night stay add on $29 per person per night Travel 17 Nov - 04 Dec 25, 02 Feb - 25 Feb 26, 09 Mar - 31 Mar 26 3 nights from $315 per person share twin. Flights are additional For Fri or Sat night stay add on $38 per person per night Travel 01 Apr - 24 Sep 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 14 Nov 25 or until sold out • Prices are correct as at 29 Oct 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Valid for departures as specified as specified. Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. Flights are additional. Blackout dates and surcharges may apply over special events, public holidays, and holiday periods • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
